tool.name: FalseDiscoveryRate
tool.description: Estimates the false discovery rate on peptide and protein level using decoy searches
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Identifications from searching a target-decoy database
Perform FDR calculation on PSM level
Perform FDR calculation on peptide level and annotates it as meta value
param.help: (Note: if set, also calculates FDR/q-value on PSM level.)

param.label: Perform FDR calculation on protein level

param.name: remove_proteins_without_psms
param.label: Remove proteins without PSMs (due to being decoy or below PSM FDR threshold)

param.name: remove_psms_without_proteins
param.label: Remove PSMs without proteins (due to being decoy or below protein FDR threshold)

param.name: remove_spectra_without_psms
param.label: Remove spectra without PSMs (due to being decoy or below protein FDR threshold)
param.help: Caution: if remove_psms_without_proteins is false, protein level filtering does not propagate

section.name: algorithm
section.title: Parameter section for the FDR calculation algorithm

param.name: no_qvalues
param.label: If 'true' strict FDRs will be calculated instead of q-values (the default)

param.name: use_all_hits
param.label: If 'true' not only the first hit, but all are used (peptides only)

param.name: split_charge_variants
param.label: If 'true' charge variants are treated separately (for peptides of combined target/decoy searches only)

param.name: treat_runs_separately
param.label: If 'true' different search runs are treated separately (for peptides of combined target/decoy searches only)

param.name: add_decoy_peptides
param.label: If 'true' decoy peptides will be written to output file, too
param.help: The q-value is set to the closest target score

param.name: add_decoy_proteins
param.label: If 'true' decoy proteins will be written to output file, too
param.help: The q-value is set to the closest target score

param.name: conservative
param.label: If 'true' (D+1)/T instead of (D+1)/(T+D) is used as a formula
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Estimates the false discovery rate on peptide and protein level using decoy searches.
For more information, visit https://openms.de/doxygen/release/3.1.0/html/TOPP_FalseDiscoveryRate.html
